summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Tom Pritzker and Jes Staley discussing a business matter related to Hutchinson. Epstein mentions that Hutchinson prefers to wait until full year results are in and expresses their desire to exit a business arrangement. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email discussing business matters with Hutchinson.

persons.name: Tom Pritzker
persons.context: Pritzker is one of the recipients of the email from Epstein regarding business discussions.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is another recipient of the email from Epstein discussing the Hutchinson business matter.

connections.description: Epstein communicates with Pritzker regarding business decisions related to Hutchinson.
Epstein discusses business matters with Staley in the email.

keyFacts: The email discusses Hutchinson's preference to wait for full year results before making a decision.
Hutchinson wants to exit a business arrangement.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be privileged information.
